line_1: Rounds jetting Lands, and doubles ev'ry Cape.
line_2: The monstrous Balance-Fish, of hideous Shape,

line_1: Did not the blockheads lace the cape.
line_2: A thread-bare coat might jokes escape,

line_1: And brav'd the stormy spirit of the Cape;
line_2: Taught her proud barks their winding way to shape,
